message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! Would you like to buy it from me for $110?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Could we perhaps agree on $95?
I understand that you're looking to keep costs down, Bob, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. Would you be willing to consider $105?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am still looking to keep the cost below $105. Could we possibly agree on $100?
